reviews.text: Pat's Pub by Sensi is a hidden gem! The cozy atmosphere immediately makes you feel at home, and the friendly staff go out of their way to ensure you have a great experience. Those who love to sing.... sing away! They have a great library of songs on Karaoke. Hungry? You'll be spoke for choice with the incredible Japanese food – fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Best way to describe Pat's.... "Where everybody knows your name" Highly recommend for anyone who appreciates Japanes food, great drinks and a welcoming vibe!

This pub is the first of its kind ... where you can have good Japanese food and have your ONE TWO.

Where can you find a place like this?

Craving for Japanese food?
This place has awesome Japanese food.

Feel like having a drink or two?
This place makes a good stiff one.

Make your down to Pat’s by Senshi. You won’t regret it.

I KNOW I DIDN’T!!!
Great family pub run by  Miguel, Juanita. Central location at Dorsett Hotel. By outram mrt Station.Pipe music and karaoke daily. Japanese cuisine.
Nice place to Chill..Reasonable Prices...Good Ambience..Its A Place Where..Friends Meets Friends...Worth the Nights..Yezzz..Its Pats Pub..
Great ambience . Nice pub with karaoke and great 80s music.central location in the heart of chinatown @  outram Park at Dorset  Hotel.mrt station exit D. come look for Nita the owner
